maze.logic

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.GameLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Core class. Contains all the game logic and objects that the main game uses.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        GameLogic constructor.
        Parameters:

        GameLogic constructor.

        mode - : mode in which the game is (CONSOLE or GRAPHICAL only)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes all game parameters related to the maze.

      • initNonSerializable

        public void initNonSerializable()
        Initializes all game parameters that are transient (that is, won't be serializable - won't be saved upon game saving).

      • allDragonsAreDead

        public boolean allDragonsAreDead()
        Checks if all dragons are dead.
        Returns:
        true if all dragons are dead

      • noDragonIsUponSword

        public boolean noDragonIsUponSword()
        Checks if there is a dragon upon a sword.
        Returns:
        true if any dragon is upon a sword

      • sendEagle

        public void sendEagle()
        Sends the eagle towards the sword. The hero looses the eagle and the eagle starts moving.

      • createTasks

        public void createTasks()
        Creates the list of user tasks. This tasks are objectives to be completed by the hero/player.

      • checkTasks

        public void checkTasks()
        Checks the state of all the tasks.

      • getConsoleInput

        public int getConsoleInput()
        Gets user input. Depending whether the game is in graphic mode or console mode the input method is different.
        Returns:
        keycode : input keycode

      • runCommand

        public void runCommand(int command)
        Executes a hero command (receives a command - after it has been converted from keycode - and executes the order).
        Parameters:
        command - : order to execute

      • getCurrentCommand

        public int getCurrentCommand(int keyCode)
        Converts a keycode into a game command.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - : key pressed by the user
        Returns:
        game command corresponding to the keycode

      • setGameBoard

        public void setGameBoard()
        Generates a board with the complete maze and all the elements.

      • updateAllDragons

        public void updateAllDragons()
        Calls method update(GameLogic game) for all dragons. For more info consult the methods.

      • getConfiguration

        public int getConfiguration(boolean disableLoad)
        Gets the configuration from the configuration window (graphical mode only).
        Parameters:
        disableLoad -
        Returns:
        0 if successful

      • loop

        public int loop()
        Main game loop.
        Returns:
        1 - new game; 5 - quit

      • loadMaze

        public void loadMaze(GameLogic gameLogic,
            java.lang.String mazeFile)

      • loadGame

        public int loadGame()
        Creates an instance of GameIO to load the game. For more information on GameIO consult the class.
        Returns:
        0 if the user has pressed the 'load' button

      • saveGame

        public int saveGame()
        Creates an instance of GameIO to save the game. For more information on GameIO consult the class.
        Returns:
        0 if the user has pressed the 'save' button
